segment.source: Applying ActiveSync policies to device accounts (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Applying ActiveSync policies to device accounts (Surface Hub)

segment.source: The Microsoft Surface Hub's device account uses ActiveSync to sync mail and calendar.
segment.target: The Microsoft Surface Hub's device account uses ActiveSync to sync mail and calendar.

segment.source: This allows people to join and start scheduled meetings from the Surface Hub, and allows them to email any whiteboards they have made during their meeting.
segment.target: This allows people to join and start scheduled meetings from the Surface Hub, and allows them to email any whiteboards they have made during their meeting.

segment.source: Applying ActiveSync policies to device accounts (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Applying ActiveSync policies to device accounts (Surface Hub)

segment.source: The Microsoft Surface Hub's device account uses ActiveSync to sync mail and calendar.
segment.target: The Microsoft Surface Hub's device account uses ActiveSync to sync mail and calendar.

segment.source: This allows people to join and start scheduled meetings from the Surface Hub, and allows them to email any whiteboards they have made during their meeting.
segment.target: This allows people to join and start scheduled meetings from the Surface Hub, and allows them to email any whiteboards they have made during their meeting.

segment.source: For these features to work, the ActiveSync policies for your organization must be configured as follows:
segment.target: For these features to work, the ActiveSync policies for your organization must be configured as follows:

segment.source: There can't be any global policies that block synchronization of the resource mailbox that's being used by the Surface Hub’s device account.
segment.target: There can't be any global policies that block synchronization of the resource mailbox that's being used by the Surface Hub’s device account.

segment.source: If there is such a blocking policy, you need to whitelist the Surface Hub as an allowed device.
segment.target: If there is such a blocking policy, you need to whitelist the Surface Hub as an allowed device.

segment.source: You must set a mobile device mailbox policy where the PasswordEnabled setting is set to False.
segment.target: You must set a mobile device mailbox policy where the PasswordEnabled setting is set to False.

segment.source: Other mobile device mailbox policy settings are not compatible with the Surface Hub.
segment.target: Other mobile device mailbox policy settings are not compatible with the Surface Hub.

segment.source: Your organization may have a global policy that prevents syncing of device accounts provisioned on Surface Hubs.
segment.target: Your organization may have a global policy that prevents syncing of device accounts provisioned on Surface Hubs.

segment.source: To configure this property, see Allowing device IDs for ActiveSync.
segment.target: To configure this property, see Allowing device IDs for ActiveSync.

segment.source: The device account must have an ActiveSync policy where the PasswordEnabled attribute is set to False or 0.
segment.target: The device account must have an ActiveSync policy where the PasswordEnabled attribute is set to False or 0.

segment.source: To configure this property, see Creating a Surface Hub-compatible Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync policy.
segment.target: To configure this property, see Creating a Surface Hub-compatible Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync policy.
